search.text: Explore the map or insert an address to look if there is yerba mate nearby!

addNewLoc.text1: You know a place where yerba mate is sold? Please add it to the map by
addNewLoc.text2: This is a community driven website and we need your help!

form.title: Add a new mate location!
form.name: Name of shop (if know)
form.success: Thank you! We will verify your submission and add it shortly!

reportModal.text: Do you want to report a bug, problem, false location or something else? Please tell us here:
reportModal.success: Thank you for your report! We will take a look at it shortly.
